DOC.brief_summary: Fetal Fibronectin Predictor Successful Induction Mid-trimester abortion .
DOC.brief_title: Fetal Fibronectin Predictor Successful Induction Mid-trimester Abortion
DOC.detailed_description: The population study comprise 135 pregnant woman attend Ain Shams University Maternity hospital labor delivery ward diagnose mid-trimester missed miscarriage confirm transabdominal ultrasound undergo termination misoprostol . Before enter study , purpose work clearly explain verbal consent obtain patient enrol study along routine write informed consent govern hospital rule . All participant subject : 1 . History taking : 1 . Personal history : age special habit 2 . Obstetric history ( parity , history abortion , previous cerculage preterm labor ) . Gestational Age assign mean combination menstrual date ultrasonographic evaluation . 3 . Past medical history ( hypersensitivity misoprostol , chronic adrenal insufficiency inherit porphyria ) . 4 . Past history previous cesarean section operation hysterotomy myomectomy . 2 . Examination : 1 . General examination : blood pressure , pulse , temperature , body weight . 2 . Abdominal examination : fundal level , presence scar previous operation , uterine contraction . 3 . Investigations : 1 . Laboratory : complete blood count , c-reactive protein titre , blood group . 2 . Pelvic ultrasound : assess fetal viability , amount liquor , gestational age , position placenta . 4 . Assessment vaginal fetal fibronectin : All Patients put dorsal lithotomy position.Using proper light source sterile glove , sterile speculum free lubricant place vagina vaginal examination senior resident special Dacron swab fetal fibronectin kit use collect sample secretion posterior fornix . The sample obtain prior collection vaginal wet preparation , cervical manipulation cervical culture , enough amount fluid ( 2ml ) found , vagina wash 2ml normal saline.The swab place sterile plastic container store assayed quantitatively Enzyme-Linked Immuno Sorbant Assay . According Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital protocol , termination pregnancy conduct inpatient procedure . Termination pregnancy perform use misoprostol tablet ( MisotacÂ® Sigma 200 mcg per tablet ) . Misoprostol tablet introduce vaginal route initially ( total 800 mcg ) . Following initial dose , 2 misoprostol tablet ( 400 mcg ) insert vagina every 4 hour maximum four dos . If woman adequate contraction , within 8 hour follow last dose , regimen repeat follow 24 hour without load dose . The induction expulsion period define time commencement misoprostol fetal expulsion without exert fetal traction caregiver . After expulsion fetus , patient receive 30 unit oxytocin 500 cc Ringer solution slowly intravenous infusion 30 minute expulsion placenta . Surgical evacuation do indicate . The kit use measure level fetal fibronectin vaginal sample ( ZYMUTEST Fibronectin kit ) provide Hyphen BioMed corporation , France . The ZYMUTEST Fibronectin kit one-step enzyme immuno-assay measuring human Fibronectin plasma , fluid fibronectin present .
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy . 1424 week gestation.. Missed miscarriage History pulmonary , hepatic , renal , cardiovascular disease . History previous cesarean section uterine surgery hysterotomy myomectomy . Inevitable abortion . Placenta cover internal o . History cervical surgery cervical amputation , cauterization dilatation . Premature rupture membrane . Any vaginal bleeding . Contraindications misoprostol hypersensitivity misoprostol , chronic adrenal insufficiency inherit porphyria .
